text:
I installed tomcat 3.2.1 on a Win 98 and Win NT machine and I'm using 
isapiredirector.dll what needs the RequestDispatcher methods forward
(ServletRequest, ServletResponse) and include(ServletRequest, ServletResponse) 
don't work, the servlet that makes this call just ends and the page that it 
forward to or includes never comes up.
creator: navteniev@yahoo.com

text:
Need code to reproduce. Does it happens on standalon ? Have you tried 3.3M2 
( many bugs in connector are fixed in 3.3 tree ) ? 
Note that IIS connector is not "supported" ( i.e. most testing is done 
with the apache connector )
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
